indicator_name: Proportion of population living in households with access to basic services
graph_title: Proportion of population living in households with access to basic services
CONTACT_FUNCT: Chief of Bureau in charge of Statistics
CONTACT_MAIL: No. 788 Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Boeng Trabek, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia
CONTACT_ORGANISATION: Ministry of Social Affairs, Veterans and Youth Rehabilitation
DATA_COMP: The indictor is computed by dividing the number of poor and vulnerable people receiving emergency social services to the total number of poor and vulnerable people and multiply by 100.
INST_MANDATE: Ministry of Social Affairs, Veterans and Youth Rehabilitation
SDG_GOAL: 1. End poverty in all its forms everywhere
SDG_INDICATOR: 1.3.1 Proportion of poor and vulnerable people receiving emergency social services
SDG_SERIES_DESCR: 1.3.1 Proportion of poor population receiving social assistance cash benefit [1.3.1] (SI_COV_POOR)
SDG_TARGET: 1.3 Implement the national support system social protection and measures various throughout country and decision to has made a lot of sense coverage of this system to the poor and vulnerable people By the year 2030
STAT_CONC_DEF: Population living below the national poverty line and people who are unable to cope with the crisis or are at high risk of crisis ) Receiving first aid services among the total poor and vulnerable
